name: Rex Rocket
description: Inspired by the retro glory days of 8-bit games, Rex Rocket is a traditional 2D platformer brought into the 21st century. Paying tribute to classic NES games like Mario, Mega Man, and Metroid, old-school platformer fans will find Rex Rocket a breath of fresh air.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (or later) Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video card (XNA 4.0 compatible, Shader Model 2.0 or higher) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card Additional Notes: Xbox 360 controller supported
